title: Mating Rituals of Migratory Humans: A Novel of Sex, Restaurants and Redemption
description: It's one thing to hide out in a Colorado tourist town full of liquor and beautiful women. Work hard, play harder. But what happens when a feud with rival restaurant managers forces an unflattering glimpse in the funhouse mirror? Who's the hero? Who's the villain? It might finally be time to choose sides.
author: Jason R. Richter
